name: Gunner Theft Extreme Terrorist
description:
Gunner Theft Extreme Terrorist

>>WELCOME TO GUNNER THEFT EXTREME TERRORIST!!<<

Enter the real world of real extreme Crime stunts. Perform dangerous mission to Challenge your Real skills.

Play as a deadly, uprising criminal and become the most feared BOSS of Crime town!

You can punch city people if they run away then they lost from map of town.Citizen has power to penetrate in to building during their run time.

If you also want to penetrate in building than you can enter in building by rolling down OR by Jumping.

This is one kind of Underworld Terrorist Survivor Game.If you are looking for Fighting Games & shooting games we have that kind of play zone collection of 3D Game. Perfect balance of strategy and fast-paced action.

Play with different guns like AK47, pistol, rifle, sniper,rocket launcher. Perform Counter terrorism activities, kill your target in sniper shots. Perform as Terrorist and attack on city strike in this shooting game.

Show your buddies from the underworld that you can dominate with no fear! Surely, being the good and the bad guy isn’t much different when you’re experiencing the thrill of action!

To know more about this game please download this running Game.
It is Free to Download and Play on Amazon Play Store.

Features:-
* Easy to control
* Effective weapons
* Realistic suburban city environment
* 3D graphics
